long_description:
If the "VISA_address" parameter is not specified the VISA_index will be
used to find the address. The LIST_VISA node can be used to show the
indicies of all available VISA instruments.
short_description: The VISA_IDENTITY node send an identity query ("*IDN?") to the specified instrument.

parameters.name: VISA_index
parameters.description: The address will be found from LIST_VISA node list with this index.

returns.description: optional: The input DataContainer is returned.
